Package remixlab.remixcam.core

Interface Summary
MouseGrabbable Interface for objects that grab mouse focus in a Scene.
Trackable Interface for objects that are to be tracked by a proscene Camera when its mode is THIRD_PERSON.
 

Class Summary
Camera A perspective or orthographic camera.
GLFrame A Frame is a 3D coordinate system, represented by a GLFrame.position() and an GLFrame.orientation().
InteractiveAvatarFrame The InteractiveAvatarFrame class represents an InteractiveDrivableFrame that can be tracked by a Camera, i.e., it implements the Trackable interface.
InteractiveCameraFrame The InteractiveCameraFrame class represents an InteractiveFrame with Camera specific mouse bindings.
InteractiveDrivableFrame The InteractiveDrivableFrame represents an InteractiveFrame that can "fly" in the scene.
InteractiveFrame A InteractiveFrame is a Frame that can be rotated and translated using the mouse.
KeyFrameInterpolator A keyFrame Catmull-Rom Frame interpolator.
MouseGrabber Base class for mouse grabbers objects that implements the MouseGrabbable interface.
MouseGrabberPool  
 

Enum Summary
Camera.Kind Enumerates the Camera kind.
Camera.Type Enumerates the two possible types of Camera.
Camera.Visibility Enumerates the different visibility state an object may have respect to the camera frustum.
